description_for_human: Plugin for processing PDF files and answering questions.
description_for_model: This plugin offers an AI-powered PDF processing capability. It enables users to extract text from PDF files stored in Google Drive and provides answers to questions based on the extracted content. Simply provide a Google Drive link to a PDF file, pose a question, and receive a pertinent answer based on the document's content. Leverage this plugin to streamline your document analysis workflows, enabling efficient processing and interaction with PDFs stored in the cloud.
